span.span: Represents a link within a syndication feed or item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可添加到 或 中。 can be added to a or . 序列化为 Atom 1.0 时，会将 以 `` 元素形式写出，而且将 属性 (Property) 以 `` 元素的属性 (Attribute) 形式写出。When serialized to Atom 1.0 a is written out as a `` element, with the properties written out as attributes of the `` element. 序列化为 RSS 2.0 时第一个具有关系值 alternate 的形式写出为``元素。When serialized to RSS 2.0, the first with a relationship value of ‘alternate’ is written out as a `` element. 而将任何其他链接以 `` 元素形式写出。Any additional links are written out as a `` elements. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example shows how to use the class. span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified , relation type, title, media type, and length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已知关系类型包括：Well-known relationship types include: - `alternate` — 该链接识别由外层源或项所描述的资源的替代版本。`alternate` - The link identifies an alternate version of the resource described by the containing Feed or Item. - `related` — 该链接识别与外层源或项关联的资源。`related` - The link identifies a resource related to the containing Feed or Item. - `self` — 该链接识别与外层源或项等效的资源。`self` - The link identifies a resource equivalent to the containing Feed or Item. - `enclosure` — 该链接识别相关资源，其大小可能很大，还可能需要特殊处理。`enclosure` - The link identifies a related resource that is potentially large in size and might require special handling. 此链接关系通常用于在源中分发播客或音频文件的情况。This link relation is often used when podcasts or audio files are distributed in a Feed. - `via` — 该链接识别充当外层源或项中所提供信息的来源的资源。`via` - The link identifies a resource that is the source of the information provided in the containing Feed or Item. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用此构造函数。The following example shows how to call this constructor. [!code-csharp[SyndicationLink#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationlink/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[SyndicationLink#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationlink/vb/snippets.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 元素。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 可以添加任何有效的 XML 元素作为扩展名，只要该元素的命名空间与外层命名空间不同。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码说明如何向联合链接添加元素扩展。The following code shows how to add an element extension to a syndication link. remarks.format: ## Remarks 已知关系类型包括：Well-known relationship types include: - `alternate` — 该链接识别由外层源或项所描述的资源的替代版本。`alternate` - The link identifies an alternate version of the resource described by the containing Feed or Item. - `related` — 该链接识别与外层源或项关联的资源。`related` - The link identifies a resource related to the containing Feed or Item. - `self` — 该链接识别与外层源或项等效的资源。`self` - The link identifies a resource equivalent to the containing Feed or Item. - `enclosure` — 该链接识别相关资源，其大小可能很大，还可能需要特殊处理。`enclosure` - The link identifies a related resource that is potentially large in size and might require special handling. 此链接关系通常用于在源中分发播客或音频文件的情况。This link relation is often used when podcasts or audio files are distributed in a Feed. - `via` — 该链接识别充当外层源或项中所提供信息的来源的资源。`via` - The link identifies a resource that is the source of the information provided in the containing Feed or Item. 序列化为 Atom 1.0 时，会将此值以 `rel` 元素的 `` 属性形式写出。When serialized to Atom 1.0 this value is written out as the `rel` attribute of the `` element. 序列化为 RSS 2.0 时，会将此值以 `rel` 元素中的 `` 属性形式写出。When serialized to RSS 2.0, this value is written out as the `rel` attribute in the `` element. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置联合链接的关系类型。The following code shows how to set the relationship type of a syndication link. 下面的 XML 演示如何将 属性序列化为 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized to Atom 1.0. summary.span: 试图分析属性扩展。

span.span: Attempts to parse an attribute extension.

returns.span: 一个指定是否已成功分析属性扩展的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the attribute extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范未定义的自定义属性。Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 为的属性进行序列化` 元素。They are serialized as an attribute of the ` element. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义属性扩展的反序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom attribute extension. 为此，必须从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的属性扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

span.span: A value that specifies whether the element extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 元素。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 可以添加任何有效的 XML 元素作为扩展名，只要该元素的命名空间与外层命名空间不同。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义元素扩展的反序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom element extension. 为此，必须从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的元素扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.

exception.span: 读取过程中遇到无效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.

summary.span: 获取和设置链接资源的 URI。

span.span: Gets and sets the URI for the linked resource.

value.span: 一个 实例，其中包含链接资源的 URI。

span.span: A instance that contains the URI for the linked resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化为 Atom 1.0 时，会将此值以 `href` 元素中的 `` 属性形式写出。When serialized to Atom 1.0 this value is written out as the `href` attribute in the `` element. 序列化为 RSS 2.0 时，会将此值以 `href` 元素中的 `` 属性形式写出。When serialized to RSS 2.0, this value is written out as the `href` attribute in the `` element. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置联合链接的 URI。The following code shows how to set the URI of a syndication link. 下面的 XML 演示如何将 属性序列化为 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized to Atom 1.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationLink#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationlink/XML/atom.xml#2)] 下面的 XML 演示如何将 属性序列化为 RSS 2.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized to RSS 2.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationLink#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationlink/XML/rss.xml#3)]

span.span: Writes the attribute extensions to the specified using the specified syndication version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范未定义的自定义属性。Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 这些扩展会序列化为 `` 元素的属性。They are serialized as an attribute of the `` element. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义属性扩展的序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the serialization of custom attribute extensions. 为此，必须从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的属性扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 元素。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 可以添加任何有效的 XML 元素作为扩展名，只要该元素的命名空间与外层命名空间不同。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义元素扩展的序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the serialization of custom element extensions. 为此，必须从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的元素扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.
